Sentencas: Efficient, economic and environmentally friendly aircrafts and their operations have become the moti-vation of research nowadays after the COVID-19 pandemic has spread around the world.
Titulo: Exergetic assessment of a newly designed solid oxide fuel cell-based system combined with a propulsion engine

Sentencas: This paper presents a combined solid oxide fuel cell with a turbofan engine system in order to potentially improve the aviation performance.
Titulo: Exergetic assessment of a newly designed solid oxide fuel cell-based system combined with a propulsion engine

Sentencas: Two different analyses are conducted through exergy and exergoeconomic approaches.
Titulo: Exergetic assessment of a newly designed solid oxide fuel cell-based system combined with a propulsion engine

Sentencas: Also, the paper investigates five alternative fuels with five fuel blends on the system per-formance.
Titulo: Exergetic assessment of a newly designed solid oxide fuel cell-based system combined with a propulsion engine

Sentencas: It is founded that the overall exergetic performance is almost the same among the five fuel blends of 82% exergetic efficiency and 18% exergy destruction ratio.
Titulo: Exergetic assessment of a newly designed solid oxide fuel cell-based system combined with a propulsion engine

Sentencas: In addition, using the methanol and hydrogen fuel blend appears to be the most economical way of achieving a relative cost difference of 38% and minimum price of electricity generation in the range of 108e621 $/GJ for turbines and SOFC.
Titulo: Exergetic assessment of a newly designed solid oxide fuel cell-based system combined with a propulsion engine

Sentencas: However, using the dimethyl ether and hydrogen fuel blend is the least favorable.
Titulo: Exergetic assessment of a newly designed solid oxide fuel cell-based system combined with a propulsion engine
